posts.post_title: FS: Graded HOF - big names - Brown Chance Evers Keeler McGraw Waddell
posts.post_content:
Some nice HOF for sale - price assume no fee method...shipping included

Brown Cubs shirt SGC 1 - $130
Evers Chicago SGC 1 - $85
Griffith portrait SGC 30 - $110
Griffith batting PSA 1.5 - $85
McGraw no cap BVG 1.5 - $100
McGraw finger SGC 20 - $100
Waddell portrait PSA 1.5 - $130
Waddell pitching PSA 2.5 - $200
